Civil Litigation

You are entitled to be paid your medical bills, damage from your vehicle, and pain and suffering damages. Furthermore, in the workplace you have basic rights that protect you.

If You Were Involved in an Auto Accident, Motorcycle Accident, Truck Accident, or Have Issues with Your Employer. Call Our Offices Immediately.

Automobile

There are no accidents, each collision is an avoidable circumstance caused by the negligence of another. Do not be deceived by the insurance companies they will offer you a quick settlement to avoid liability. Do not talk to the insurance companies without legal representation.

Employment

All employees have basic rights in the workplace, including the right to be free from discrimination, correct time sheets, minimum wage, and overtime compensation.

Mr. Sobieraj gladly assists with the following:

1. Employer and Employee Disputes

2. Personal Injury

3. Automobile Accidents

4. Contract Disputes

5. Breach of Fiduciary Duties

Discuss Your Options with Your Local Civil Litigation Attorney.
